snippet.title: Jo-Ann Fabric and Craft Store

* 3.
Jo-Ann Fabric and Craft Store
?
6320 Seven Corners Ctr (at Arlington Blvd & Leesburg Pike)
Arts & Crafts •
* Jenny C. • September 16, 2012This place always has a customer losing their mind and yelling at a clerk. In part because the lines and procedures are so slow, 10 minute quick run ons are almost always a half hour.
